sentences.en: Any prolonged injury to Rooney or Saha , in particular , would devastate United.
sentences.cn: 任何一些有关鲁尼和萨哈的长期伤病都可能毁了曼联.

sentences.en: Devastate can crit and therefore generate added threat from the extra damage.
sentences.cn: 毁灭打击可以产生致命一击,因此可以从额外的伤害中获取额外的威胁值.

sentences.en: Devastate damage - per - sunder increased to 35.
sentences.cn: 破坏每破甲数量增加的伤害增加到35.

sentences.en: Devastate damage ( and threat ) benefits from damage - increasing talents.
sentences.cn: 毁灭打击产生的伤害和威胁值可以从增加伤害的天赋中受益.

sentences.en: Devastate deals damage to the target.
sentences.cn: 毁灭打击对目标造成伤害.

sentences.en: Devastate deals more damage ( and threat ) as your gear improves.
sentences.cn: 随着你的装备提升,毁灭打击产生更多的伤害和威胁值.

sentences.en: Does Devastate generate more threat per hit than Sunder Armor?
sentences.cn: 毁灭打击比破甲产生更多的威胁值 吗 ?

sentences.en: In what ways is Devastate better than Sunder Armor?
sentences.cn: 毁灭打击到底在哪些方面比破甲好?

sentences.en: Is Devastate necessary for any type of tanking?
sentences.cn: 对于任何种类的坦克,毁灭打击都是必要的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Rob was devastated by the news of her death.
sentences.cn: 罗布听到她死去的消息悲痛欲绝。

sentences.en: Situations that would devastate others may be dealt with in constructive ways.
sentences.cn: 破坏他人的情况会转变为有意义的方式.

sentences.en: The city centre was devastated by the bomb.
sentences.cn: 市中心被这枚炸弹摧毁了。

sentences.en: The Lurker focuses on spies, cloaks and subterfuge to devastate opponents.
sentences.cn: 潜行者专注于使用间谍, 掩饰,和诡计去摧毁敌人.

sentences.en: They intended to devastate the town at one stroke.
sentences.cn: 他们企图一举摧毁全城.

sentences.en: This is the Weapon Damage component of Devastate for our example tank.
sentences.cn: 这就是样本坦克用于毁灭打击计算中的武器伤害.

sentences.en: We will never break, though they devastate, we shall motivate.
sentences.cn: 我们永远不会打破, 但他们摧毁, 我们应鼓励.

sentences.en: What exactly happens when I hit the Devastate button?
sentences.cn: 我点击毁灭打击这个技能后,到底会发生什么?

trans.tran_en: to damage something very badly or completely

trans.tran_cn: 破坏， 毁坏； 使震惊， 使极为悲痛
